args.name: jobID
args.description: The jobID of the schedule to pause.

args.name: jobID
args.description: The jobID of the schedule to resume.

name: $deleteSchedule
description: Deletes a schedule and clears its interval.

args.name: jobID
args.description: The jobID of the schedule to delete.

name: $editSchedule
description: Edits an existing schedule's code and/or time without resetting stats.

args.name: jobID
args.description: The ID of the schedule to edit

name: $listSchedules
description: Returns a JSON array of all active schedule jobIDs.

name: $startSchedule
description: Executes code after a given duration until canceled.

args.name: time
args.description: How long to wait before running this code.

name: $activeSchedules
description: Returns an array of active (not paused) schedule IDs.

name: $allScheduleDetails
description: Returns an array of JSON objects representing all schedule details.

name: $isSchedulePaused
description: Returns true if the schedule is paused.

name: $pausedSchedules
description: Returns an array of paused schedule IDs.

name: $scheduleDetails
description: Returns the details of a schedule with the given jobID as a JSON string.

name: $scheduleExists
description: Checks if a schedule with the given ID exists.

name: $scheduleNextRun
description: Returns the ms remaining until the next run of a schedule.

name: $scheduleRunCount
description: Returns how many times a schedule has run.
